attributes.contentHtml:
You could at least show proof of you making payments to Azure.

Using Freenom domains is pretty unprofessional seens as you never actually OWN the domain - and if you are abusing Azure, you obviously have little to no money & so that's why you are also using a free-issued domain?

How on earth could you afford Azure if you can't afford a domain?
